# Traveler's Tome (Level 4 Transmuter)
## Overview
*This small book, no larger than a pocket notebook, is bound between wooden covers, and is clearly a copy meant to withstand the rigors of adventuring. The arrowhead lodged in the cover can’t be removed without magic.*

**Protection** Simple lock (DC 20)

**Opposition Schools** Conjuration, enchantment 

**Value** 340 gp

**Spells**

2nd—*[[Glide (Spell)|glide]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Knock (Spell)|knock]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Levitate (Spell)|levitate]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Rope Trick (Spell)|rope trick]]* <sup>S</sup>

1st—*[[Ant Haul (Spell)|ant haul]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Erase (Spell)|erase]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Expeditious Retreat (Spell)|expeditious retreat]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Gravity Bow (Spell)|gravity bow]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Hold Portal (Spell)|hold portal]]*, *[[Jump (Spell)|jump]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|magic weapon]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 121
